amendatorysection.para: Any person satisfactorily completing the examination required by section 39-2307 or exempt from such examination under the provisions of subsection (2) of section 39-2306 shall be issued a Class B license as a county highway or city street superintendent. Such license shall be valid for a period of one year and shall be renewable upon the payment of an annual fee of ten dollars. Any person holding a license on January 1, 2004, shall be deemed to be holding a Class B license under this section.
